column4: I'm guessing this might be an ntfs drive? In that case, if you check it''s info, I'm guessing it says that you need to run chkdisk, from windows...
thanks, yes it is ntfs. So if i run chkdisk and then re-enter ubuntu i should be able to resize?
normally that is the problem, if you check info for the partition it should say... I think
i checked the info and it didnt say anything about chkdisk but i will try it anyway thanks
